languages.text: "Секретарь Скаландр пожелал встретиться с вами тет-а-тет. Из соображений безопасности он не пожелал посвящать меня в сей вопрос более необходимого". {n}Клеменциа едва заметно кривится.{/n} "Секретарь ожидает у дверей кабинета — поговорите с ним, как только представится возможность. Речь идет о безопасности всего протектората".

traits.locale_text: "Секретарь Скаландр пожелал встретиться с вами тет-а-тет. Из соображений безопасности он не пожелал посвящать меня в сей вопрос более необходимого". {n}Клеменциа едва заметно кривится.{/n} "Секретарь ожидает у дверей кабинета — поговорите с ним, как только представится возможность. Речь идет о безопасности всего протектората".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Секретарь Скаландр пожелал встретиться с вами тет-а-тет. Из соображений безопасности он не пожелал посвящать меня в сей вопрос более необходимого". {n}Клеменциа едва заметно кривится.{/n} "Секретарь ожидает у дверей кабинета — поговорите с ним, как только представится возможность. Речь идет о безопасности всего протектората".

Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

languages.text: « Le secrétaire Scalander a exprimé son désir de vous rencontrer en privé. Pour des raisons de sécurité, il a souhaité ne pas m'informer des raisons exactes de cette requête, {n}dit Clémentia en grimaçant légèrement.{/n} Le secrétaire attend devant les portes de vos quartiers. Il vous demande de vous entretenir avec lui dès que possible. Cette affaire concernerait la sécurité du protectorat dans son ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Le secrétaire Scalander a exprimé son désir de vous rencontrer en privé. Pour des raisons de sécurité, il a souhaité ne pas m'informer des raisons exactes de cette requête, {n}dit Clémentia en grimaçant légèrement.{/n} Le secrétaire attend devant les portes de vos quartiers. Il vous demande de vous entretenir avec lui dès que possible. Cette affaire concernerait la sécurité du protectorat dans son ensemble. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “斯卡兰德秘书明确希望与您单独会面。出于保密原因，他并没有告诉我这个要求的确切原因。”{n}克莱门缇雅微微皱了皱眉。{/n}“他已经在您房间门口等着了，希望您有空的时候和他谈谈。很显然，这件事情关系到整个王朝的安全。”
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “斯卡兰德秘书明确希望与您单独会面。出于保密原因，他并没有告诉我这个要求的确切原因。”{n}克莱门缇雅微微皱了皱眉。{/n}“他已经在您房间门口等着了，希望您有空的时候和他谈谈。很显然，这件事情关系到整个王朝的安全。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「スカランダー長官は、内密にあなたにお会いしたいとおっしゃっています。機密上の理由から、正確な理由は私も知らされておりません」{n}クレメンティアはかすかに苦笑した。{/n}「長官はあなたの部屋のドアの前でお待ちです。あなたの都合が付き次第、できるだけ速やかにお話がしたいとのことで。どうやらこの件は、保護領全体の治安に関わることのようです」
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「スカランダー長官は、内密にあなたにお会いしたいとおっしゃっています。機密上の理由から、正確な理由は私も知らされておりません」{n}クレメンティアはかすかに苦笑した。{/n}「長官はあなたの部屋のドアの前でお待ちです。あなたの都合が付き次第、できるだけ速やかにお話がしたいとのことで。どうやらこの件は、保護領全体の治安に関わることのようです」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Sekretär Scalander äußerte seinen Wunsch, Euch unter vier Augen zu sprechen. Aus Sicherheitsgründen wollte er mir keine genauen Gründe für seine Anfrage mitteilen." {n}Clementia verzieht leicht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Sekretär wartet an den Türen Eures Zimmers auf Euch. Er bittet Euch, so schnell wie möglich mit ihm zu sprechen. Anscheinend betrifft die Angelegenheit die Sicherheit Eures gesamten Protektorats."
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Sekretär Scalander äußerte seinen Wunsch, Euch unter vier Augen zu sprechen. Aus Sicherheitsgründen wollte er mir keine genauen Gründe für seine Anfrage mitteilen." {n}Clementia verzieht leicht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Sekretär wartet an den Türen Eures Zimmers auf Euch. Er bittet Euch, so schnell wie möglich mit ihm zu sprechen. Anscheinend betrifft die Angelegenheit die Sicherheit Eures gesamten Protektorats."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «El secretario Scalander ha expresado su deseo de reunirse con usted en privado. Ha tenido a bien no informarme de sus intenciones concretas por motivos de seguridad». {n}Clementia hace una leve mueca.{/n} «El secretario está esperando ante las puertas de sus aposentos. Ha solicitado que hable usted con él tan pronto como le sea posible. Al parecer, se trata de un asunto que concierne a la seguridad de todo el protectorado».
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «El secretario Scalander ha expresado su deseo de reunirse con usted en privado. Ha tenido a bien no informarme de sus intenciones concretas por motivos de seguridad». {n}Clementia hace una leve mueca.{/n} «El secretario está esperando ante las puertas de sus aposentos. Ha solicitado que hable usted con él tan pronto como le sea posible. Al parecer, se trata de un asunto que concierne a la seguridad de todo el protectorado».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Yazman Scalander sizinle özel bir görüşme yapma isteğini dile getirdi. Güvenlik nedeniyle talebinin asıl sebebinin ne olduğu konusunda beni bilgilendiremedi." {n}Clementia'nın yüzü, çok hafif buruşuyor.{/n} "Yazman sizi odanızın kapısında beklemekte. Müsait olduğunuz ilk anda onunla konuşmanızı rica ediyor. Söylediğine göre tüm protektoranın güvenliğiyle ilgili bir meseleymiş."
languages.original_text: "Secretary Scalander has articulated his desire to meet you in private. For security reasons, he has resolved not to inform me of the exact reasons behind this request." {n}Clementia grimaces faintly.{/n} "The secretary is waiting at the doors to your room. He asks that you speak with him at your earliest convenience. Apparently this matter concerns the security of the entire protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Yazman Scalander sizinle özel bir görüşme yapma isteğini dile getirdi. Güvenlik nedeniyle talebinin asıl sebebinin ne olduğu konusunda beni bilgilendiremedi." {n}Clementia'nın yüzü çok hafif buruşuyor.{/n} "Yazman sizi odanızın kapısında beklemekte. İlk müsait olduğunuz anda onunla konuşmanızı rica ediyor. Söylediğine göre tüm protektoranın güvenliğiyle ilgili bir meseleymiş."
traits.speaker: Clemence
